com.github.katjahahn.tools

Class Visualizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.katjahahn.tools.Visualizer

  • public class Visualizer
extends java.lang.Object
    Creates an image that represents the structure of a PE file on disk.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int DEFAULT_ADDITIONAL_GAP
      The default of the reduced size on each side of pixels that lie on top of others.
      static int DEFAULT_FILE_WIDTH
      The default width of the file shown is 300
      static int DEFAULT_HEIGHT
      The default image and file height is 600
      static int DEFAULT_LEGEND_WIDTH
      The default width of the legend is 200
      static int DEFAULT_PIXEL_SIZE
      The default size of one pixel-block in the image is 5
      static boolean DEFAULT_PIXELATED
      The default for pixelating the image is false .

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Visualizer(PEData data)
      Visualizer instance with default values applied.
      Visualizer(PEData data, int pixelSize)
      Visualizer instance with pixelSize and otherwise default values applied.
      Visualizer(PEData data, int pixelSize, boolean pixelated, int additionalGap)
      Creates a visualizer instance based on pixelSize and, pixelated and additionalGap.
      Visualizer(PEData data, int pixelSize, boolean pixelated, int additionalGap, int fileWidth, int legendWidth, int imageHeight)
      Creates a visualizer instance.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.awt.image.BufferedImage createEntropyImage() 
      java.awt.image.BufferedImage createImage()
      Creates a buffered image that displays the structure of the PE file.
      int getAdditionalGap() 
      int getFileWidth()

      boolean isPixelated() 
      static void main(java.lang.String[] args) 
      void setAdditionalGap(int additionalGap)
      Sets the reduced size on each side of square pixels that lie on top of others.
      void setBytesPerPixel(int bytes)
      Sets the number of file bytes that are represented by one square pixel.
      void setFileWidth(int fileWidth)
      Sets the width of the PE file representation in (real) pixels.
      void setHeight(int height)
      Sets the height of the resulting image, thus also the height of the PE file representation.
      void setLegendWidth(int legendWidth)
      Sets the width of the legend.
      void setPixelated(boolean pixelated)
      Sets pixelated mode, meaning every square pixel in the image has borders if true.
      void setPixelSize(int pixelSize)
      Sets the length and width of one square pixel.

      • DEFAULT_FILE_WIDTH

        public static final int DEFAULT_FILE_WIDTH
        The default width of the file shown is 300
        See Also:

        public static final int DEFAULT_HEIGHT
        The default image and file height is 600

        The default size of one pixel-block in the image is 5

        public static final int DEFAULT_LEGEND_WIDTH
        The default width of the legend is 200
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_ADDITIONAL_GAP

        public static final int DEFAULT_ADDITIONAL_GAP
        The default of the reduced size on each side of pixels that lie on top of others. Imagine it like a transparent border. Value is 1
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • DEFAULT_PIXELATED

        public static final boolean DEFAULT_PIXELATED
        The default for pixelating the image is false .

        A pixelated image will have borders for every pixel-block.

        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • Visualizer

        public Visualizer(PEData data)
        Visualizer instance with default values applied.

        Default values are:

        • DEFAULT_PIXEL_SIZE
        • DEFAULT_PIXELATED
        • DEFAULT_ADDITIONAL_GAP
        • DEFAULT_HEIGHT
        • DEFAULT_FILE_WIDTH
        • DEFAULT_LEGEND_WIDTH
        Parameters:
        data - the data object of the PE file to visualize

      • Visualizer

        public Visualizer(PEData data,
          int pixelSize)
        Visualizer instance with pixelSize and otherwise default values applied.

        Default values are:

        • DEFAULT_PIXELATED
        • DEFAULT_ADDITIONAL_GAP
        • DEFAULT_HEIGHT
        • DEFAULT_FILE_WIDTH
        • DEFAULT_LEGEND_WIDTH
        Parameters:
        data - the data object of the PE file to visualize
        pixelSize - size of one rectangle that represents a certain amount of bytes

      • Visualizer

        public Visualizer(PEData data,
          int pixelSize,
          boolean pixelated,
          int additionalGap)
        Creates a visualizer instance based on pixelSize and, pixelated and additionalGap. Otherwise default values applied.

        Default values are:

        • DEFAULT_HEIGHT
        • DEFAULT_FILE_WIDTH
        • DEFAULT_LEGEND_WIDTH
        Parameters:
        data - the data object of the PE file to visualize
        pixelSize - size of one rectangle that represents a certain amount of bytes
        pixelated - applies a border to every pixel
        additionalGap - the reduced size on each side of pixels that lie on top of others, e.g. for the resource section

      • Visualizer

        public Visualizer(PEData data,
          int pixelSize,
          boolean pixelated,
          int additionalGap,
          int fileWidth,
          int legendWidth,
          int imageHeight)
        Creates a visualizer instance.
        Parameters:
        data - the data object of the PE file to visualize
        pixelSize - size of one rectangle that represents a certain amount of bytes
        pixelated - applies a border to every pixel
        additionalGap - the reduced size on each side of pixels that lie on top of others, e.g. for the resource section
        fileWidth - the width of the shown file
        legendWidth - the width of the legend
        imageHeight - the height of the image

      • createImage

        @Ensures(value={"result != null","result.getWidth() == legendWidth + fileWidth","result.getHeight() == height"})
public java.awt.image.BufferedImage createImage()
                                         throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a buffered image that displays the structure of the PE file.
        Returns:
        buffered image
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if sections can not be read

      • setBytesPerPixel

        @Requires(value="bytes > 0")
public void setBytesPerPixel(int bytes)
        Sets the number of file bytes that are represented by one square pixel. The height of the image is changed accordingly.

public void setLegendWidth(int legendWidth)
